From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of jazminway
Sent: maandag 31 mei 2010 16:16
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] MacGregor's Ghost Instructions?





Hello!

We got a second hand MacGregor's Ghost game with no instructions. The only
instructions I can find online are in Dutch and the online translation
doesn't really make any sense.

Does anyone happen to know how it's played?

Thanks!
Leslie

messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] MacGregor's Ghost Instructions?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Leslie, I m Dutch and could maybe try to translate it, if you don t get the English instructions. Groetjes, Mirjam :o), met Adam (8), Boaz (5) en Levi (2).
messages.messageBody:
Hi Leslie,



I'm Dutch and could maybe try to translate it, if you don't get the English
instructions.
